name: 414 South (Shareware Version)
description:
414 South - Shareware Version

At latitude 41.4 degrees south lies the country of New Zealand.

On New Years Eve in 1944, three brothers have set out on an adventure. Their journey takes an exciting turn when they discover a meteorite impact and decide to investigate.
But they aren't the only ones to witness it. They soon encounter a ruthless and unexpected adversary - the German Navy.
And when a treasure of immense value is found, Nick, Finn and Harry must use all their wits and unique skills as they try to keep it on New Zealand soil.

Made with GB Studio by Chris Maltby.

Music by AJ Booker, Ember, Krumel, Rulz, Tomas Danko.

ControlsGame Boy
KeyboardMoveD-PadArrow Keys & WASD
InteractAZSwitch Characters
BXToggle Following
SelectShiftOpen Menu
StartEnter

Full Versions (Green, Yellow and Red) are in development.


  • Solve puzzles and explore the New Zealand bush.
  • Collect native shells, bugs and more to unlock bonus scenes.
  • Avoid crabs, play minigames, and meet the local wildlife.
  • Drink milo, and throw chips to seagulls.
  • Summit a mountain, abseil into glow worm caves, get lost in a swamp, and swim at the beach.

Shareware Download includes Box/Cart Cover, 1080p Wallpapers, GBC file, and conversions for N64, 3DS and Analogue Pocket. I am only able to test the N64 version however.
